title: COVID INTERVIEWS: First US “Vaccine Mandate” Lawsuit, and “The Challenge Of The Truth” (FROM NEW MEXICO TO FRANCE SOIR)
cleaned_text:
Publisher’s Note: In this interview, Spiro is joined by Attorney Ana Garner of New Mexico. Garner represents her client Isaac Legaretta, an officer at the Doña Ana County Detention Center and a military veteran, who is suing the county over its new policy for first responders to receive the COVID-19 vaccinations or face termination. Attorney Garner explains the significance of this case and what is at stake, as it is the first of its kind and may set a new standard for legal precedent regarding mandatory vaccination. Garner says she is prepared to take this case to the Supreme Court if necessary. Spiro and Ana Garner also discuss another case of her’s that is ongoing currently. A case that challenges not only the Governor of New Mexico, but the emergency itself. Support NM Stands Up! here.

Meanwhile, Nobel Prize winning virologist Luc Montagnier holds forth on COVID, science, “vaccines,” lockdowns, Bill Gates, and viral totalitarianism in this vital interview. “There is no scientific truth anymore,” he explains. “With the vaccine, we are totally playing Sorcerer’s Apprentice – humans must not be used as guinea pigs, children must not be used as guinea pigs.” Listen, ponder, and share widely. And please support Vermont Independent’s work through our Patreon page.
